content: pattern notes this throw is made up of 35 motifs that are crocheted separately and then seamed together an edging is added after seaming materials premier® yarns colorfusion™ dk 100% acrylic 3 5 oz/100g 325 yds/298m mc 1196-15 vintage 15 balls cc 1196-06 seaside 5 balls hook us size h-8 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle skills/techniques used in this pattern chains single_crochet half_double_crochet and double_crochet stitches working flat and in the round seaming with whipstitch magic_ring
